events.message: We have received an application from a highly qualified software engineer interested in joining our backend team.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering based on their software development experience and technical skills.
Recruiter John has been assigned to manage the candidate's process and coordinate the upcoming interviews.
The initial screening call was successful; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and best coding practices.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the role and availability for technical interview scheduling.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th, involving the senior engineering manager and two dev team leads.
The candidate completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving skills and received positive feedback from interviewers.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 7th to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies with the candidate.
The candidate had a productive HR interview and showed strong alignment with company values and work culture.
An offer letter proposing the agreed salary and benefits package has been sent to the candidate for review.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to move forward with the process.
The candidate accepted the offer officially today, confirming their joining date for onboarding.
Onboarding process has started with the candidate attending orientation and completing initial setup tasks.
The hiring process for the software engineer position is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the team.
